verses.verse: Awake <WH5782>, awake <WH5782>; put on <WH3847> your strength <WH5797>, O Zion <WH6726>; put on <WH3847> your beautiful <WH8597> garments <WH899>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>, the holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>: for henceforth there shall no more <WH3254> come <WH935> into you the uncircumcised <WH6189> and the unclean <WH2931>.

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, You have sold <WH4376> yourselves for nothing <WH2600>; and you shall be redeemed <WH1350> without money <WH3701>.

For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, My people <WH5971> went down <WH3381> aforetime <WH7223> into Egypt <WH4714> to live <WH1481> there <WH804>; and the Assyrian oppressed <WH6231> them without cause <WH657>.

Therefore my people <WH5971> shall know <WH3045> my name <WH8034>: therefore they shall know in that day <WH3117> that I am he that does speak <WH1696>: behold, it is I.

As many <WH7227> were astonished <WH8074> at you <WH4758>; his visage was so marred <WH4893> more than any man <WH376>, and his form <WH8389> more than the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>:
